roleset.name: stretch the neck
roleset.note: CRANE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'crane' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.3.2, Framenet entry Body movement. (from crane.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [Mainstream economists and commentators]-3, [*-3]craning their necks up at the great pyramids of junk financing, swiveling their heads to watch the avalanche of leveraged buy-outs, claimed the end result would be a leaner, meaner corporate America, with soaring productivity and profits and the weaker gone to the wall.
example.arg: at the great pyramids of junk financing
